title: LeaverBuster disabled
body:
LeaverBuster should not be active if the match takes longer than the average time. On Summoner's Rift (5v5), the average time is 30-45 minutes. If the match takes longer than 45 minutes and a player leaves, LeaverBuster shouldn't take place.

It's not the player's fault that he managed his time specifically as if the match would take around 30-45 minutes, only happening to play and find out the match takes even longer than that. If the player leaves for any reason, he / she should be given lenience.

Of course, many can debate against this and this is anything but a suggestion but it's an idea for people to think about.

replies.body: You should always allow for up to an hour when starting a match, regardless of the stated average game time. That is only an average after all. If you don't it's your own fault for not accounting for that amount of time. Leavebuster should be active throughout the match, regardless of how long it takes.

^ people should always anticipate a game for last *at least an hour* (even though the majority fall within the 30-45 min mark).

If people want a game that will definitely be over before 45 minutes they should play aram or bots. 

I ***love*** it when I get into a game with someone that needs the game to be over in x amount of minutes, because they are really pushy and usually turn into absolute ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ when the game doesn't finish within the time and afk.
